title: Do you like going to the beach? Why or why not?

korean: 나는 바다 가는 걸 정말 좋아해.
특히 여름에 더위 식히러 가는 게 최고야.
바다 소리 들으면서 산책하는 게 진짜 힐링이야.
파도 소리가 스트레스를 다 날려버리는 것 같아.
모래사장에 앉아서 일몰 보는 것도 너무 좋아.
수영하는 것도 재밌고 운동도 되니까 좋아.
친구들이랑 같이 가면 비치발리볼 같은 것도 하고.
해산물 먹는 것도 바다 갈 때의 즐거움 중 하나야.
회나 조개구이 같은 거 먹으면 진짜 맛있어.
다만 사람 많은 건 좀 싫긴 해.
english: I really love going to the beach.
Especially in summer, going to cool off is the best.
Walking while listening to the ocean sounds is, like, truly healing.
The sound of waves seems to blow away all the stress.
Sitting on the sand and watching the sunset is also really nice.
The sea breeze is also refreshing and makes me feel good.
Swimming is also fun and, you know, it's good exercise.
When I go with friends, we also play beach volleyball and stuff.
Eating seafood is also one of the pleasures of going to the beach.
Eating sashimi or grilled shellfish is really delicious.
However, I do dislike when it's crowded.
But overall, I always love the beach.
